name: voral/version-increment
description: A tool for semantic versioning and changelog generation in Composer projects based on Git commits.

scripts-descriptions.vi: Run the version increment tool in automatic mode.
scripts-descriptions.vi:debug: Run the version increment tool in debug mode to preview changes without applying them.
scripts-descriptions.test: Run PHPUnit tests with warnings displayed.
scripts-descriptions.coverage: Generate code coverage report using Xdebug and PHPUnit.
scripts-descriptions.stan: Run PHPStan static analysis on the 'src' and 'tests' directories.
scripts-descriptions.fixer: Check coding standards using PHP-CS-Fixer (dry-run mode).
scripts-descriptions.check: Run all checks, including coding standards and static analysis.
